page.title: 15Food and drink in Cheshunt
page.content: In Cheshunt food is bought from Tesco's,which is at the Old Pond next to Barclays Bank.Brookfield Farm Tesco's sell their own goods such as bread and cakes,which are quite cheap. In schools they sell roast dinners, salads and junk food like hamburgers, hot dogs and chips.In junior and infant schools dinners cost 66p a day which is 3.30 pounds a week. The fish and chip shop is next to Cheshunt post office and the Wimpey is a couple of shops away from Grundy Park.The chinese shop is in the row of shops next to Cadmore Lane.There is a chinese restaurant which sells prawn crackers,spring rolls,soup,chickens and beef curries.The Wimpey sells all different burgers,chips and drinks.The Indian take away sells curries and rice but it also sells chicken.
